item.title: Build my own hugo blog with additional features

item.description: Abstract I’ll mainly discuss about two major aspect of using hugo. Part II is based on my personal experience which may not be suitable for other. PART I: Wanted Feature (Those important feature for me) PART II: [Content Management Experience]() Wanted Features (or Solutions) 1. Display hierarchy categories (Partial) 2. Search inside blog 3. Manage image in static 4. Shortcut for image url 1.Display hierarchy categories The categories of hugo is only one-level (It’s called Taxonomies).
